PageTitle: multicast outgoing interface cfc check enable
FuncDef:
The multicast outgoing interface cfc check enable command enables consistency check on the forwarding-plane and control-plane entries of multicast outbound interfaces on a board.
The undo multicast outgoing interface cfc check enable command disables this function.
By default, consistency check is enabled on the forwarding- and control-plane entries of multicast outbound interfaces on a board.
CLIs: multicast outgoing interface cfc check enable
undo multicast outgoing interface cfc check enable
Examples: [~HUAWEI-slot-1] multicast outgoing interface cfc check enable
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The command output can be used for fault diagnosis. In Layer 3 multicast, P2MP, or mLDP scenarios, run the multicast outgoing interface cfc check enable command to enable consistency check on the forwarding-plane and control-plane entries of multicast outbound interfaces on a board.
